text: Věra Chytilová (2 February 1929 – 12 March 2014) was an avant-garde Czech movie director. She was known for her works in Daises, Wolf's Hole, A Hoof Here, a Hoof There, and The Inheritance or Fuckoffguysgoodday. Chytilová was born in Ostrava, Czechoslovakia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Czechoslovak writers Category:Czech movie directors Category:Czech screenwriters
title: Věra Chytilová
